scripts.deploy-mainnet: NETWORK=optimism node scripts/generate-subgraph.js && graph build && graph deploy --studio super-accounts
scripts.deploy-staging: NETWORK=optimism-staging node scripts/generate-subgraph.js && graph build && graph deploy --studio super-accounts-staging
scripts.deploy-testnet: NETWORK=sepolia node scripts/generate-subgraph.js && graph build && graph deploy --studio superchainsmartaccount-testnet
